article.Heading: Budget 2017: See whether Modi sticks to reform promises, says Russell Napier
article.Summary: Speaking to CNBC-TVC18, Russell Napier, Co-founder of ERIC said demonetisation is a major and brave move, but it came at a bad time. Cash restoration is taking more time than anyone would have thought.
article.Body:
The upcoming Budget is crucial as it is an opportunity for the government to show how it is different from other countries. It will be seen whether Prime Minister Narendra Modi is able to fulfill his reform promises or not, said Russell Napier, Co-founder of ERIC.

Speaking to CNBC-TVC18, Napier said demonetisation is a major and brave move, but it came at a bad time. Cash restoration is taking more time than anyone would have thought.
